definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

sentences.english: He's here on a visit from Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 他是專程從廣州到這裏來拜訪的。

sentences.english: Dr Gammans travelled to the Czech Republic to learn the method.
sentences.chinese: 加曼斯博士專程到捷克共和國去學習這個方法。

sentences.english: Thank you for coming all the way to my company.
sentences.chinese: 感謝各位專程遠道造訪本公司。

sentences.english: I came here specially to ask you for advice.
sentences.chinese: 我是專程來這裏向你請教的。

sentences.english: I'm here to apologize to you for everything I've accidentally done to you.
sentences.chinese: 我專程來這裏爲我對你們無意所做的一切表示道歉。

sentences.english: I went to the school specially to see the teacher.
sentences.chinese: 我專程去學校就是爲了見那位老師。

sentences.english: Bobby Bolivia : Did you come here to see me?
sentences.chinese: 你是專程來看望我的嗎？

sentences.english: He was on vacation in Hawaii and came back to deal with this.
sentences.chinese: 他原來在夏威夷度假專程回來處理這些事情。

sentences.english: Don't find love, let love find you.
sentences.chinese: 別專程去尋找愛情，讓愛情來發現你。

sentences.english: Famous painters usually go there on special trip for drawing.
sentences.chinese: 諸景傳說衆多，常有著名的畫家專程來此覽勝作畫。

sentences.english: Boring Password Manager is a special trip to help you solve this problem.
sentences.chinese: 無聊密碼管理器就是專程來幫您解決此問題的。

sentences.english: I came here specially for the important meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我是專程來出席這次重要會議的。

sentences.english: Xianghe meatloaf made a special trip to enjoy a few have come.
sentences.chinese: 專程爲品嚐香河肉餅而來的也不在少數。

sentences.english: To which gate do I need to go to catch connecting flight 707 to New York City.
sentences.chinese: 帶哪一個門口我纔可以專程707航班到紐約呢？

sentences.english: Four star chefs from Thailand are going to play the lead role in this festival.
sentences.chinese: 這家的泰國美食節是由專程請來的四位泰國主廚掌勺。

sentences.english: Thank you for making a special trip to come and see us in Fukushima Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝您不久前專程前來福島縣看望我們。
